text:
The portions are just right, and the pricing is reasonable, considering the location and partial sea view. The white wine, priced at $38 (inclusive of GST), is a good deal, though it would be nicer if they served it in proper wine glasses instead of plastic ones.

The curry fish tail, at around $30+, has ample curry but not much meat. On the other hand, the large vegetable dish at $11.90 is great value, offering nearly double the portion size you‚Äôd find elsewhere for a small.

The food flavors are decent, though nothing particularly stands out. I wouldn‚Äôt mind returning if I‚Äôm in the area.

No crowd on a public holiday (labor Day)

Perfect lunch place. I had curry chicken cubes rice and it did not disappoint. Flavour and portion is good! Will be back again with family. Lovely and scenic sea view üôèüèº. Great service rendered by the ladies. üëè

Foods were good with reasonable price, seafood were fresh .
The restaurant just beside the beach, recommended visit weekday to get away from our city life  by the beach with friends or family.
Enjoy the sea wind, aeroplane fly over, monitor lizard walk pass your table.

Found a gem at Changi Coast! Cycled from T4 to zhengzichar and the friendly staffs kindly allow us to park our bicycles next to our table, which has a gorgeous seaview! Food is good and inexpensive too. Highly recommend as shown by the boy, who gave two thumbs up!

1st visit since they took over Bellyview.  It's Zichar food but it's really nice and value for money. An outstanding item with the Seafood Trio which comprises big prawns, small squid and a generous serving of clams in a delicious zesty Thai that is out of this world. Service was also excellent with Chris (Mei Ling) our server being so cheerful and helpful. Her sincerity and friendliness made us so feel so at home.

The ambience is perfect on a cool evening, listening to the lapping waves and planes flying overhead as we enjoy yummy food over sunset

Update 30 Dec 24: Our 3rd visit - food, service and ambience never fails. We came at 630 pm n stayed till closing at 9 pm. It was so good to enjoy good food and service with the seabreeze, sounds of waves and planes flying overhead. Mei Ling and her colleagues were so helpful and friendly. She recommended the lobster which was only $57. Very reasonable indeed. We had it in chilli Crab sauce and it was yummy with the mantou. Flesh was succulent and tender unlike some other lobsters I've had.
